name: py-pathlib
description:
Object-oriented filesystem paths. Attention: this backport module isn't
maintained anymore. If you want to report issues or contribute patches,
please consider the pathlib2 project instead.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
